[Home](./index.md) &gt; [server](./server.md) &gt; [BaseCharacterController](./server.basecharactercontroller.md)

## BaseCharacterController class

A base class for character controller implementations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export default abstract class BaseCharacterController 
```

## Remarks

The BaseCharacterController should be extended by a more specific character controller that you or a plugin implements.
